text: Shujabad railway station (Urdu and )is located in the city ofShujabad, in Multan district of Punjab province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Multan District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Shujabad railway station
